page.title: 18YORKSHIRE TRACTION COMPANY
page.content: THE BUS SERVICES IN OUR AREA ARE PROVIDED MAINLY BY THE YORKSHIRE TRACTION COMPANY AND WE FOUND THAT OUT OF THE 126 FAMILIES IN SCHOOL 6 MEN, ALL DRIVERS, WORKED THERE. ALL BUSES IN REGULAR USE USE THE BUS-WASH DAILY AND THE INSIDES OF THE BUSES ARE SWEPT OUT EVERY NIGHT. THE EARLIEST BUS THROUGH BANK END IS AT 7.OO A.M. AND THE LAST ONE IS AT 1O.45 P.M. AT THE MOMENT FARES ARE SUBSIDISED BY THE SOUTH YORKSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL AND THEY ARE PROBABLY THE LOWEST IN THE COUNTRY, BUT IF THE GOVERNMENT HAS ITS WAY THIS CHARGE ON THE RATES WILL BE STOPPED AND THEN FARES COULD RISE FOUR OR FIVE TIMES WHAT THEY ARE NOW. THE Y.T.C. HAS 3O COACHES, 15O SINGLE DECKERS AND 15O DOUBLE DECKERS. THEY HAVE A LIFE OF ABOUT 13 YEARS BUT THEY STILL RUN ONE BUS WHICH IS 5O YEARS OLD AND IT MAY BE HIRED OUT.
